docs.snippet: England’s soccer association handed down one of its most severe penalties Wednesday after the Liverpool star Luis Suárez bit a Chelsea defender in Sunday’s game....
docs.lead_paragraph: England’s soccer association handed down one of its most severe penalties Wednesday after the Liverpool star Luis Suárez bit a Chelsea defender in Sunday’s game.
docs.abstract: Soccer Roundup; Liverpool striker Louis Suarez is suspended for 10 games for biting an opponent during English Premier League soccer game.

headline.seo: Liverpool’s Suárez Barred 10 Games for Biting
headline.main: Suárez Barred 10 Games for Biting Opponent

docs.snippet: For all of the artist’s efforts to lay claim to the spotlight, he and his paintings have not exactly been embraced by the art elite....
docs.lead_paragraph: For all of the artist’s efforts to lay claim to the spotlight, he and his paintings have not exactly been embraced by the art elite.
docs.abstract: Profile of Domingo Zapata, 38-year-old Spanish artist who has been compared to Andy Warhol yet is barely recognized by the art elite; Zapata recently hired Paul Wilmot Communications, public relations agency specializing in fashion, to help get his work noticed by museums like the Guggenheim and the Museum of Modern Art.

headline.seo: Domingo Zapata’s Best-Known Work May Be Himself
headline.main: Domingo Zapata’s Best-Known Work May Be Himself

docs.snippet: John Tavares, 44, a math teacher in Mississauga, Ontario, and an uncle of the Islanders star, is the highest-scoring player in the history of indoor lacrosse....
docs.lead_paragraph: John Tavares, 44, a math teacher in Mississauga, Ontario, and an uncle of the Islanders star, is the highest-scoring player in the history of indoor lacrosse.
docs.abstract: Profile of John Tavares, 44-year-old math teacher in Mississauga, Ontario, and uncle of New York Islanders star center, also named John Tavares; in addition to being the uncle of a sports star, the older Tavares is himself the highest-scoring player in the history of indoor lacrosse.

headline.seo: John Tavares, Uncle of Islanders Star, Also Knows How to Find the Net
headline.main: A Lacrosse Star Who Is a Math Teacher First
headline.print_headline: A Lacrosse Star Who Is a Math Teacher First

byline.contributor: Allan Kreda contributed reporting from Uniondale, N.Y.
